title: 4-Day Luxury Mountain Hiking Tour
description: Embark on a thrilling 4-day luxury mountain hiking experience. Discover breathtaking landscapes, indulge in gourmet meals, and unwind in opulent accommodations. Perfect for adventure seekers who crave luxury.

highlights.title: Luxury Mountain Accommodations
highlights.description: Stay in exclusive mountain lodges offering panoramic views, modern amenities, and unmatched comfort.

highlights.title: Private Guide and Tailored Itinerary
highlights.description: Enjoy personalized experiences with a dedicated guide ensuring safety and a custom-tailored itinerary.

highlights.title: Gourmet Meals Included
highlights.description: Savor delicious gourmet meals, featuring local flavors and international cuisine prepared by expert chefs.

itinerary.title: Arrival and Welcome Dinner
itinerary.description: Arrive at the base lodge and enjoy a warm welcome from our team. Indulge in a gourmet dinner under the stars, with live acoustic music. Accommodations in luxury mountain cabins.

areaHighlights.title: Scenic Base Camp Views
areaHighlights.description: Marvel at breathtaking mountain vistas right from your lodge.

itinerary.description: Embark on a guided hike through lush trails, discovering hidden waterfalls and stunning panoramas. Midway, enjoy a gourmet picnic lunch prepared by our chefs.

areaHighlights.description: Explore secret waterfalls, perfect for photography and a refreshing dip.

itinerary.title: Spa and Relaxation Day

itinerary.description: Enjoy a hearty farewell breakfast, featuring local and international dishes, before your private transfer back to the airport.

title: 2-Week All Around Sri Lanka Adventure
description: Embark on an epic 14-day journey exploring the cultural, natural, and urban gems of Sri Lanka, with guided tours, luxurious stays, and unforgettable experiences.

highlights.title: Cultural Landmarks
highlights.description: Discover the rich history and heritage of Sri Lanka through its ancient temples, palaces, and UNESCO World Heritage sites.

itinerary.description: Visit historic landmarks like the Sigiriya Rock Fortress, Dambulla Cave Temple, and Polonnaruwa.

itinerary.description: End your journey with a traditional farewell ceremony and transfer to the airport.
